name: Music_1985.wav
keywords: ['electric guitar arpeggio', 'chord arpeggios', 'chorus pedal', 'guitar riff', 'repeated progression']
caption: This is a repeated chord progression that's arpeggiated on an electric guitar. The guitar signal has a chorus pedal effect applied to it, and so it doesn't sound like a clean tone. The arpeggio itself is mellow yet uplifting.
